statements: SELECT * FROM high_net_worth_clients;
SELECT client_name, assets, income FROM high_net_worth_clients;
SELECT client_id, liabilities, expenses FROM high_net_worth_clients;
SELECT client_name, assets, liabilities, income, expenses FROM high_net_worth_clients;
SELECT * FROM high_net_worth_clients ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, assets FROM high_net_worth_clients WHERE assets > 100000 ORDER BY client_name ASC
SELECT client_id, client_name, income FROM high_net_worth_clients WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY income DESC
SELECT client_id, client_name, liabilities FROM high_net_worth_clients WHERE liabilities < 20000 ORDER BY client_id ASC
SELECT client_id, client_name, expenses FROM high_net_worth_clients WHERE assets - liabilities > 5000 ORDER BY expenses ASC
SELECT client_id, client_name, assets, liabilities, income, expenses FROM high_net_worth_clients WHERE assets - liabilities > income - expenses ORDER BY client_id DESC
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM high_net_worth_clients;
SELECT client_id, assets, liabilities FROM high_net_worth_clients WHERE assets > 1000000;
SELECT client_name, assets - liabilities AS net_worth FROM high_net_worth_clients;
SELECT * FROM client_income_expenses WHERE income > expenses;
SELECT client_name, income, expenses FROM high_net_worth_clients JOIN client_income_expenses ON high_net_worth_clients.client_id = client_income_expenses.client_id;
SELECT * FROM high_net_worth_clients WHERE assets > 100000 AND liabilities < 50000;
SELECT client_name, assets - liabilities AS net_worth FROM high_net_worth_clients ORDER BY net_worth DESC;
SELECT client_name, income, expenses, income - expenses AS net_balance FROM high_net_worth_clients JOIN client_income_expenses ON high_net_worth_clients.client_id = client_income_expenses.client_id;

SELECT client_name, SUM(income) AS total_income FROM high_net_worth_clients JOIN client_income_expenses ON high_net_worth_clients.client_id = client_income_expenses.client_id GROUP BY client_name HAVING total_income > 50000;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM high_net_worth_clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 1000 ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT liability_name FROM liabilities WHERE liability_value < 0;
SELECT id, income FROM income_expenses WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value, liability_name, liability_value FROM assets JOIN liabilities ON assets.client_id = liabilities.client_id;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM assets WHERE client_id = 1
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 1000 ORDER BY asset_value DESC
SELECT liability_name, liability_value FROM liabilities WHERE client_id = 2 ORDER BY liability_value ASC
SELECT SUM(income) AS total_income, SUM(expenses) AS total_expenses FROM income_expenses WHERE client_id = 3
SELECT * FROM liabilities WHERE client_id = 1 OR client_id = 2
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, address FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 10000;
SELECT client_id, income_type, income_amount FROM income ORDER BY income_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM clients WHERE client_id = 5;
SELECT SUM(asset_value) AS total_assets FROM assets WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT income_type, income_amount FROM income WHERE income_date >= '2022-01-01' AND income_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT expenses.client_id, expenses.expense_type, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses JOIN clients ON expenses.client_id = clients.client_id GROUP BY expenses.client_id ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT client_name, occupation FROM high_net_worth_clients;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 100000;
SELECT client_name, income_source, income_amount FROM high_net_worth_clients INNER JOIN income ON high_net_worth_clients.client_id = income.client_id;
SELECT expense_category, expense_amount FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT client_name, asset_type, asset_value FROM high_net_worth_clients INNER JOIN assets ON high_net_worth_clients.client_id = assets.client_id;
SELECT client_name, date_of_birth FROM high_net_worth_clients WHERE occupation = 'Doctor';
SELECT asset_type, asset_value FROM assets ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT client_name, SUM(income_amount) AS total_income FROM high_net_worth_clients JOIN income ON high_net_worth_clients.client_id = income.client_id GROUP BY client_name;
SELECT client_name, asset_type, asset_value FROM high_net_worth_clients JOIN assets ON high_net_worth_clients.client_id = assets.client_id WHERE assets.asset_value > 100000 ORDER BY asset_value DESC;

SELECT client_name, SUM(income_amount) - SUM(expense_amount) AS net_income FROM high_net_worth_clients JOIN income ON high_net_worth_clients.client_id = income.client_id JOIN expenses ON high_net_worth_clients.client_id = expenses.client_id GROUP BY client_name ORDER BY net_income DESC;
